analysis.Summary: Vue single-file component rendering a bell icon using inline SVG. It exposes customizable props for fill color and theme.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable notification/bell icon in the UI with configurable color and theme.

Components.name: IconBell
Components.role: Functional Vue component that outputs a bell-shaped SVG and accepts props for fill color and theme.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Declares component props in the <script setup> context

analysis.Usage: Import with `import IconBell from 'modules/icons/entities/IconBell.vue'` and use in templates as `<IconBell fill="#ff0000" theme="dark" />`.
Notes: No <style> block is defined; styling relies on the SVG and CSS variables
`theme` prop is declared but not currently used in the template
The SVG path is complex and defines the bell shape; altering `fill` updates the icon color
